short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Run a heuristic evaluation on your website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UX Check makes heuristic evaluations quick and easy. The extension will open up Nielsen's Ten Heuristics in a side pane next to your website. When you click on an element that doesn't comply with a heuristic, you can add notes, and a screenshot will be saved. At the end, you can export everything to a docx so that you can share them with your team.
